commits.message:
Fix: Android crash on update (v1.0.24) and enhance Search UI gestures

- Fixed crash caused by missing Koin ProGuard rules.
- Hardened database migrations (24->25, 25->26) with column existence checks.
- Updated versionCode to 10 and versionName to 1.0.24.
- Implemented swipe gestures for search bar (left to expand, right to collapse).
- Smoothed search expansion animation in ExpressiveTopBar.
- Added BackHandler to close search bar on system back press.
commits.author: JoyinJoester

commits.message:
Fix Unified TOTP delay, App launch logic, and Autofill improvements

- Unified TOTP: Added timeOffset support to synchronize progress bar with code generation.
- App Launch: Default tab now respects user's bottom nav order configuration.
- Autofill:
  - Added KeePass support in Vault Selector.
  - Improved suggested password filtering.
  - Enhanced Picker UI (removed star, added copy actions).
  - Fixed save dialog username detection with heuristics.
  - Unified trigger entry point and field swapping fixes.
commits.author: JoyinJoester

commits.message:
fix: 修复WebDAV备份缺少第三方登录(SSO)字段和常用账号信息

## 问题修复

### 1. 第三方登录(SSO)字段未备份
- 在 PasswordBackupEntry 和 TrashPasswordBackupEntry 中添加 SSO 相关字段:
  - loginType: 登录类型 (PASSWORD/SSO)
  - ssoProvider: SSO提供商 (GOOGLE, APPLE, FACEBOOK 等)
  - ssoRefEntryId: 引用的账号条目ID
- 备份时导出所有SSO字段
- 恢复时还原SSO字段并处理ID映射

### 2. 常用账号信息未备份
- 新增 CommonAccountBackupEntry 数据类
- 备份时导出常用账号信息到 common_account.json
- 恢复时以合并模式还原（只在本地为空时恢复，保护用户数据）

### 3. 数据安全性增强
- SSO引用无效时自动清空，避免悬空引用
- 完善的ID映射逻辑
- 详细的错误处理和日志记录

## 兼容性保障
- ✅ 向后兼容: 旧备份可被新版本正确读取
- ✅ 向前兼容: 新备份被旧版本读取时会忽略新字段
- ✅ 数据保护: 恢复时不覆盖用户更新的数据

修改文件:
- Monica for Android/app/src/main/java/takagi/ru/monica/utils/WebDavHelper.kt
- Monica for Android/app/src/main/java/takagi/ru/monica/viewmodel/DataExportImportViewModel.kt
- Monica for Android/app/src/main/java/takagi/ru/monica/ui/screens/WebDavBackupScreen.kt
commits.author: JoyinJoester

commits.message:
feat: 实现常用账号信息自动填充功能

- 添加自动填充模式：勾选自动填充时，新建条目自动填入常用账号信息
- 添加手动选择模式：未勾选时，点击填充按钮可手动填入用户名、邮箱、手机号
- 修改AddEditPasswordScreen支持常用账号信息的读取和自动填充
- 在用户名、邮箱、电话字段添加快速填充按钮
- 添加相关字符串资源（中英文）
commits.author: JoyinJoester

commits.message:
feat: add image compression to WebDAV backup and fix OOM/concurrency issues

- Implemented ImageCompressor utility for smart image reduction.
- Added manual "Image Optimization" button and progress UI in WebDavBackupScreen.
- Hardened WebDavHelper with AtomicBoolean lock to prevent duplicate backup triggers.
- Improved memory management in WebDAV upload flow to mitigate OOM errors.
commits.author: JoyinJoester
